title: Beyond the Horror: 1984 Episode 2
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: I have recently been re-watching apocalypse and when Michael showed up in Madison's personal hell she said and I quote "you don't belong here". I think it's funny that that is the exact same wording that Jonas uses when he sees someone out of place. Could he be caught in his own personal hell that's why he relives the same moment over and over again. Could there be some kind of witch involvement?
I keep waiting for someone to call “cut”!  I think they are all method actors on a set!!
I hope the ‘episode 5 twist’ is Twisty the Clown! He’s a relative of Jingles! 😂
I thought the over/under for episodes that Ray would last through would be 3. I didn't like the story arc of Cordellia. Apocalyse had it's good and bad moments. 1984 has exceeded my expectations.
I ❤️ When Murder Motel says, "Can I be Honest??" 👍😂😄
description:
Beyond the Horror: 1984 Episode 2
Host is MaryGirl Moody with special guests Michael Mullins Wright, Diana Fitzgerald, and Murder Motel.

► ► SUBSCRIBE
